flow.descriptionCdata:
cbc702dd-73b9-40db-983a-86b12f6c45e7.1a013f01-761e-4e35-ab4c-def158d850e8.description=
Retrieve power state of virtual machine (poweredOn,poweredOff,suspended).

Inputs\:
host - VMWare host hostname or IP.
user - VMWare username.
password - VMWare user's password.
port - Port to connect on.
protocol - Connection protocol (http or https).
closeSession - Close the internally kept VMWare Infrastructure API session at completion of operation (true, false).
virtualMachine - Primary Virtual Machine identifier. Inventorypath (Datacenter/vm/Folder/MyVM), Name of VM, IP (IPv4 or IPv6 depending upon ESX version), hostname (full), UUID, or the VM id (vm-123,123).
vmIdentifierType - Virtual machine identifier type (inventorypath, name, ip, hostname, uuid, vmid).

Responses\:
success - The operation completed successfully.
failure - Something went wrong.

Returns\:
returnResult - Task completion return message.
powerState - Power state (poweredOn,poweredOff,suspended).

Notes\:
Inventory Path Formatting\: If host is an ESX server inventory path will be\: ha-datacenter/vm/ .  If host is a vCenter the inventory path will be\: /vm// . The / part of the path is based on the "Virtual Machines & Templates" view in the vCenter client. The inventory path is case sensitive.
cbc702dd-73b9-40db-983a-86b12f6c45e7.3280767d-200d-4d02-bed8-e97e55c6abdd.description=
Retrieve power state of virtual machine (poweredOn,poweredOff,suspended).

Inputs\:
host - VMWare host hostname or IP.
user - VMWare username.
password - VMWare user's password.
port - Port to connect on.
protocol - Connection protocol (http or https).
closeSession - Close the internally kept VMWare Infrastructure API session at completion of operation (true, false).
virtualMachine - Primary Virtual Machine identifier. Inventorypath (Datacenter/vm/Folder/MyVM), Name of VM, IP (IPv4 or IPv6 depending upon ESX version), hostname (full), UUID, or the VM id (vm-123,123).
vmIdentifierType - Virtual machine identifier type (inventorypath, name, ip, hostname, uuid, vmid).

Responses\:
success - The operation completed successfully.
failure - Something went wrong.

Returns\:
returnResult - Task completion return message.
powerState - Power state (poweredOn,poweredOff,suspended).

Notes\:
Inventory Path Formatting\: If host is an ESX server inventory path will be\: ha-datacenter/vm/ .  If host is a vCenter the inventory path will be\: /vm// . The / part of the path is based on the "Virtual Machines & Templates" view in the vCenter client. The inventory path is case sensitive.
cbc702dd-73b9-40db-983a-86b12f6c45e7.57d0c95b-29bf-4825-9584-1438f14023a7.description=
Sleeps for "X" seconds.

Inputs\:
seconds - The number of seconds to sleep.

Responses\:
success - Slept for "X" seconds.
failure - was unable to sleep for some reason
cbc702dd-73b9-40db-983a-86b12f6c45e7.ad4c48f6-1ab1-4d34-b00a-150771bf2f5c.description=
Attempts to shutdown the guest virtual machine.

Inputs\:
host - VMWare host hostname or IP.
user - VMWare username.
password - VMWare user's password.
port - Port to connect on.
protocol - Connection protocol (http or https).
closeSession - Close the internally kept VMWare Infrastructure API session at completion of operation (true, false).
virtualMachine - Primary Virtual Machine identifier. Inventorypath (Datacenter/vm/Folder/MyVM), Name of VM, IP (IPv4 or IPv6 depending upon ESX version), hostname (full), UUID, or the VM id (vm-123,123).
vmIdentifierType - Virtual machine identifier type (inventorypath, name, ip, hostname, uuid, vmid).

Responses\:
success - The operation completed successfully.
failure - Something went wrong.

Returns\:
returnResult - Operation result message.

Notes\:
Inventory Path Formatting\: If host is an ESX server inventory path will be\: ha-datacenter/vm/ .  If host is a vCenter the inventory path will be\: /vm// . The / part of the path is based on the "Virtual Machines & Templates" view in the vCenter client. The inventory path is case sensitive.
cbc702dd-73b9-40db-983a-86b12f6c45e7.ad4efa9c-1060-484b-a7bc-def529f4ab63.description=
Compares two strings, returning a true response if and only if they contain the same sequence of characters. A null string is considered to be equal to an empty string.

Inputs\:
string1 - The first string.
string2 - The second string.
ignoreCase - If set to 'true', then the comparison ignores case considerations. The two strings are considered equal ignoring case if they are of the same length and corresponding characters in the two strings are equal ignoring case. If set to any value other than 'true', then the strings must match exactly to be considered equal.

responses\:
true - If the two strings are equal
false - If the two strings are not equal
cbc702dd-73b9-40db-983a-86b12f6c45e7.c7855ec6-9c82-485e-a81b-0db14522026a.description=
Compares two strings, returning a true response if and only if they contain the same sequence of characters. A null string is considered to be equal to an empty string.

Inputs\:
string1 - The first string.
string2 - The second string.
ignoreCase - If set to 'true', then the comparison ignores case considerations. The two strings are considered equal ignoring case if they are of the same length and corresponding characters in the two strings are equal ignoring case. If set to any value other than 'true', then the strings must match exactly to be considered equal.

responses\:
true - If the two strings are equal
false - If the two strings are not equal
cbc702dd-73b9-40db-983a-86b12f6c45e7.d2ac328f-a692-46b3-a892-9347b7213a6d.description=
Counts from one number to another number.

Inputs\:
from - The number to start counting at
to - The number to count to
incrementBy - The amount to increment by during each count.
reset - If set to true, then the counter will restart counting from the beginning.

Responses\:
has more - Not yet done counting.
failure - Something went wrong.
no more - Done counting. This will only be returned once, then counting restarts.

Returns\:
The number that was just counted.
flow.name: VCenter_GraceFullShutdown
